name: Honeymoon Island State Park

parking.notes: Large parking lot, rarely full except summer weekends. Arrive before 10am for best spots.

description: Natural beach with pristine waters, nature trails, and excellent shelling. Pet beach area available.
accessibility: ADA accessible with beach wheelchairs available at ranger station.

name: Clearwater Beach

parking.notes: Multiple parking garages. Beach Walk garage most convenient. Can be very busy.

description: Award-winning white sand beach with tons of amenities, restaurants, and activities. Very popular.
accessibility: Fully ADA accessible. Beach wheelchairs available at Beach Operations office.

name: Caladesi Island State Park

parking.notes: Accessible only by boat. Ferry runs from Honeymoon Island. Limited capacity.

description: Pristine, undeveloped island beach consistently rated among best in US. Nature trails and kayak rentals.
accessibility: Limited accessibility due to boat access and natural terrain.

name: Fred Howard Park Beach

parking.notes: Ample free parking. Popular with locals, especially on weekends.

description: Causeway leads to beautiful beach island. Shallow waters perfect for families. Playgrounds and picnic areas.
accessibility: Paved paths to beach area. Limited sand accessibility.

name: Dunedin Causeway Beach

parking.notes: Parking along causeway. Can fill up on weekends. Multiple access points.

description: Dog-friendly beach with calm waters. Popular with kayakers and paddle boarders. Great for sunsets.
accessibility: Easy beach access from parking. Some areas have steep sand.

name: Sand Key Park

parking.notes: Large lot, but fills quickly on weekends. Arrive early.

description: Natural dunes and sea oats. Great for shelling. Quieter than nearby Clearwater Beach.
accessibility: ADA accessible facilities. Beach wheelchair available.

name: Indian Rocks Beach

parking.notes: Street parking and small public lots. Can be challenging on busy days.

description: Quiet residential beach with local charm. Less crowded than tourist beaches. Good for families.
accessibility: Beach access at multiple public access points. Some have ramps.

name: Madeira Beach

parking.notes: John's Pass area has paid parking. Public beach accesses have limited free parking.

description: Lively beach near John's Pass Village. Great for dining, shopping, and water sports. Sunset celebrations.
accessibility: Several ADA accessible beach entrances. Boardwalk at John's Pass is wheelchair accessible.
